original_text: Amaziah did things that the Lord said were good. He lived in the way that his father Joash had done. But he did not do as well as his ancestor King David had done.
korean_text: 아마샤가 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나 그의 조상 다윗과는 같지 아니하였으며 그의 아버지 요아스가 행한 대로 다 행하였어도

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were good
that his father Joash had done
But he did not do as well
as his ancestor King David had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 조상 다윗 왕이 행했던 것처럼
